name: Basic Plan
description: Perfect for beginners starting their fitness journey with essential access.
features: Access to gym floor (6 AM – 9 PM)
Access to cardio and strength area
Basic shower and changing room access

name: Standard Plan
description: Ideal for regular gym-goers who want flexible access and additional support.
features: Free group fitness classes (Zumba, Yoga, HIIT)

name: Premium Plan
description: All-inclusive option designed for serious fitness enthusiasts and athletes.
features: Free participation in gym events and competitions
